title: Project Manager Election – Treasury League
body:
### Summary
Idle Governance is entering the team formation phase of the Treasury League.

This poll aims to elect the Project Manager(s) that will analyze, propose and distribute grants/bounties.

[This post](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-treasury-league-open-applications/431) collects all the applications submitted between 23th April - 30th April.

### Details
Project Manager candidates:
@mangaa18 - full-time: [Application post](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-treasury-league-open-applications/431/2)
@Salome - full-time: [Application post](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-treasury-league-open-applications/431/3)
@emixprime - full-time: [Application post](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-treasury-league-open-applications/431/5)
@iboxidle - part-time: [Application post](https://gov.idle.finance/t/job-treasury-league-open-applications/431/6)

The most voted PMs that will fulfill 2 full-time positions will officially get selected for the Treasury League. The number of PMs can be rounded up if a part-time candidate is voted in top2. In this case, the League would have 1.5 full-time members, and the 3° most voted person can join the group to reach 2 or 2.5 full-time profiles.

Selected applicants will enter a 3-week sprint phase, where they would receive the midpoint compensation for their seniority level. After this bootstrap sprint, Supervisors will define the final compensation package. In this timeframe, SVs have the right to upgrade/downgrade if it’s clear that the proposed seniority level is not matched.

Each address can only vote for one choice and it is not possible to split the voting power (this is how the current Snapshot polls work). Note that you can change your vote at any moment, therefore if the name you chose is already in the top positions, you can switch the selection and pick another preferred profile.

### Other References:
- [A Step Towards Idle Leagues – Dev & Treasury](https://gov.idle.finance/t/a-step-towards-idle-leagues-dev-treasury/419)
- [About Idle Leagues](https://idlefinance.medium.com/about-idle-leagues-73fa538f18e5)
### Vote Options
A candidate is successfully elected if reached at least 10’000 IDLE votes. Please note that it's possible to change the votes at any moment till the voting window is closed.

Please cast your vote on one of the following options:
- Elect @mangaa18 
- Elect @Salome 
- Elect @emixprime
- Elect @iboxidle 
- None of the above
author: 0x30723bb508E84706297EeF689C20096907023897
